Html:
Hi Radioman,

I am running into a TypeLoad exception when trying to set the CacheLocation property of Windows Froms GmapControl.

I am not sure if this is related to how i am building my application, but i am building for any cpu.

The only bug i found related is this: https://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/394738 but, the location to the cache root is correct.

Could not load type 'GMap.NET.Internals.CacheLocator' from assembly 'GMap.NET.Core, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b85b9027b614afef'

Any ideas?

Thank for this wonderful opensource GIS!
